member.name: N:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing
member.summary: Exposes classes for authoring barcodes.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeAlignment
member.summary: Determines how barcodes will be aligned within a bounding rectangle

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeAlignment.Near
member.summary: Barcodes will be drawn starting from the near edge (left edge for left to right layout)

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeAlignment.Center
member.summary: Barcodes will be drawn centered within the bounds

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeAlignment.Far
member.summary: Barcodes will be drawn starting from the far edge (right edge for left to right layout)

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeOrientation
member.summary: Used to set the orientation of barcodes being drawn

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeOrientation.Right
member.summary: Left to right

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeOrientation.Left
member.summary: Right to left

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeOrientation.Up
member.summary: Bottom to top

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeOrientation.Down
member.summary: Top to bottom

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle
member.summary: Used to set the symbology used in one-dimensional barcodes

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.MsiPlessey
member.summary: Variable length. Numeric only. Always includes a check digit.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Interleaved2of5
member.summary: Variable length. Numeric only. If the number of digits is odd, a 0 will be prepended to the data.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Interleaved2of5Chk
member.summary: Same as Interleaved2of5 but with a check digit.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Codabar
member.summary: Variable length. Numeric and the capital letters A-D.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code39
member.summary: Variable length. Numeric, uppercase letters and space, -, ., $, , / and +. Asterisk is used as a start/stop character.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code39Chk
member.summary: Same as Code39, but with a check digit.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code39Ext
member.summary: Variable length but includes the ASCII 128 character set.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code39ExtChk
member.summary: Same as Code39Ext, but with a check digit.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code93
member.summary: Similar to Code39, but includes two weighted check digits.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code93Ext
member.summary: Same as Code93 but supports the ASCII 128 character set.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code128A
member.summary: Variable length. Includes capital letters, digits, punctuation marks, and control characters. A check digit is added.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code128B
member.summary: Similar to Code128A, but includes lower case letters instead of some symbols.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Code128C
member.summary: Variable length. Numeric only. High density. It encodes an even number of digits, but will prepend a leading zero if needed.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.UpcA
member.summary: Fixed length, twelve digits. Numeric only. Eleven digits are supplied and a 12th check digit will be added.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.UpcE
member.summary: Fixed length, seven digits. Numeric only. Six digits are supplied and a 7th check digit will be added.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Ean13
member.summary: Fixed length, thirteen digits. Numeric only. Twelve digits are supplies and a 13th check digit will be added.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Ean8
member.summary: Fixed length, eight digits. Numeric only. Seven digits are supplies and an 8th check digit will be added.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle.Postnet
member.summary: Fixed length. Numeric only. A check digit will be added.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding
member.summary: Encoding methods used to encode text strings into Data Matrix data.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.Auto
member.summary: Select the best encoding method.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.ASCII
member.summary: Uses ASCII only

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.C40
member.summary: Uppercase, numeric and space.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.Text
member.summary: Encodes characters from standard and extended ASCII

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.X12
member.summary: Encodes uppercase, numeric, space, carriage return, * and >.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.EDIFACT
member.summary: Encodes characters from ASCII 32 to 94, which includes space, letters, numbers and many symbols and punctuation characters.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.Base256
member.summary: Encodes all 8 bit characters.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolOrientation
member.summary: Used to control the orientation of Data Matrix barcodes.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixSymbolSize
member.summary: Used to control the size of the Data Matrix symbols. S members are square (equal rows and columns), R members are ordered row x column.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.LayoutMode
member.summary: Used to control the layout of modules in a barcode. If set to auto, the module width and ratio are computed for you.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417SymbolOrientation
member.summary: Used to set the orientation of PDF 417 barcodes.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl
member.summary: BarcodeControl is a Windows Forms control that allows authoring of one-dimensional barcodes.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new BarcodeControl.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the BarcodeControl object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.Validate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates the string for the BarcodeControl's Barcode style.
member.returns: Returns true if the barcode is valid, false if allowExceptions is set to false.
member.param: The text to validate.
If allowExceptions is set to true, Validate will throw an ArgumentException if the text is invalid.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.Alignment
member.summary: Sets or gets the alignment of the barcode within the Bounds of the control. Defaults to center.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.BarcodeBounds
member.summary: Gets the actual rectangle of the rendered barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.CaptionFont
member.summary: Sets or gets the font used to display the barcode's caption (if enabled).

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.DisplayCaption
member.summary: Sets or gets whether or not the caption should be drawn with the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.EncodedText
member.summary: Gets the text that was rendered in the barcode. This may include check sum digits or start/stop codes not painted by the control.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.LayoutMode
member.summary: Sets or gets how the barcode will be rendered within the Bounds. Default is LayoutMode.Auto
member.remarks: When set to Auto, the control will determine the best size and proportions for the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.ModuleRatio
member.summary: Sets or gets the ratio of wide bars to narrow bars in the barcode in barcodes that use wide and narrow strips. Default is 1.5.
member.remarks: Will throw if the value is set to a number less than 1.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.ModuleWidth
member.summary: Determines the widths of narrow bars in a barcode with both narrow and wide bars. Default is 2.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.Orientation
member.summary: Sets or gets the orientation of the rendered barcode. Default is BarcodeOrientation.Right

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeControl.Style
member.summary: Sets or gets the type of the barcode that will be rendered. Default is BarcodeStyle.Code39

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter
member.summary: The BarcodeWriter class allows creation of one-dimensional barcodes on Graphics objects.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new BarcodeWriter object

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new BarcodeWriter object that will create Code 39 barcodes.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.#ctor(Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeStyle)
member.summary: Constructs a new BarcodeWriter object that will create barcodes in the specified symbology.
member.param: The symbology of the barcodes that will be written.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases resources held by the writer.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Render(System.String,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws a barcode onto the Graphics object within the bounds.
member.remarks: Although any string may be passed in, not all characters may be representable in the barcode. Use Validate() to ensure that all text is renderable.
member.param: The text of the barcode.
The Graphics object on which to draw.
The bounds of the barcode.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Validate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates the string for the BarcodeControl's Barcode style.
member.param: The text to validate.
If allowExceptions is set to true, Validate will throw an ArgumentException if the text is invalid.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Alignment
member.summary: Sets or gets the alignment of the barcode within the Bounds of the control. Defaults to center.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.BackColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the background color of the barcode. Default is white.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds of the most recently rendered barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.CaptionFont
member.summary: Sets or gets the font used for the barcode caption (if enabled). Default is 8 point Arial.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.DisplayCaption
member.summary: Sets or gets whether or not the caption should be drawn with the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.EncodedText
member.summary: Gets the text that was rendered in the barcode. This may include check sum digits or start/stop codes not contained in the text passed to render.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.ForeColor
member.summary: The foreground color of the barcode. Default is black.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.LayoutMode
member.summary: Sets or gets how the barcode will be rendered within the Bounds. Default is LayoutMode.Auto
member.remarks: When set to Auto, the control will determine the best size and proportions for the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.ModuleRatio
member.summary: Sets or gets the ratio of wide bars to narrow bars in the barcode in barcodes that use wide and narrow strips. Default is 1.5.
member.remarks: Will throw if the value is set to a number less than 1.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.ModuleWidth
member.summary: Determines the widths of narrow bars in a barcode with both narrow and wide bars. Default is 2.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Orientation
member.summary: Sets or gets the orientation of the rendered barcode. Default is BarcodeOrientation.Right

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.BarcodeWriter.Style
member.summary: Sets or gets the type of the barcode that will be rendered. Default is BarcodeStyle.Code39

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl
member.summary: BarcodeControl is a Windows Forms control that allows authoring of Data Matrix two-dimensional barcodes. Data Matrix is a compact format that can encode binary data as well as text.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new DataMatrixBarcodeControl.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the DataMatrixBarcodeControl object.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.Columns
member.summary: Returns the number of columns in the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.InnerBounds
member.summary: Returns the inner bounds of the DataMatrix symbol.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.ModuleSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest square element in the symbol. Default is 20.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.Orientation
member.summary: Sets the orientation of the barcode. Default is DataMatrixSymbolOrientation.Horizontal

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.Rows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows in the DataMatrix barcode

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.SymbolEncoding
member.summary: Sets or gets the encoding used for text strings rendered in the Data Matrix barcode. Default is DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.Auto.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeControl.SymbolSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol size used for rendered Data Matrix barcodes. Defaults to DataMatrixSymbolSize.Auto.
member.remarks: Auto will select the smallest symbol size that will contain the data supplied.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter
member.summary: The DataMatrixBarcodeWriter class allows creation of Data Matrix two-dimensional barcodes on Graphics objects.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new DataMatrixBarcodeWriter object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes resource aquired by the DataMatrixBarcodeWriter object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Render
member.summary: Draws the Data Matrix barcode on a Graphics object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Render(System.Byte[],System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws a barcode representing the supplied binary data onto the Graphics object within the bounds.
member.param: Binary data to render in the barcode.
The Graphics object on which to draw.
The bounds of the barcode.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Render(System.String,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws a barcode representing the supplied text onto the Graphics object within the bounds.
member.param: The text of the barcode.
The Graphics object on which to draw.
The bounds of the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.BackColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the background color of the barcode. Default is white.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds of the most recently rendered barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Columns
member.summary: Returns the number of columns in the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Encoding
member.summary: Sets or gets the encoding used for text strings rendered in the Data Matrix barcode. Default is DataMatrixSymbolEncoding.Auto.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.ForeColor
member.summary: The foreground color of the barcode. Default is black.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.ModuleSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the smallest square element in the symbol. Default is 20.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Orientation
member.summary: Sets the orientation of the barcode. Default is DataMatrixSymbolOrientation.Horizontal

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Rows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows in the DataMatrix barcode

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.DataMatrixBarcodeWriter.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol size used for rendered Data Matrix barcodes. Defaults to DataMatrixSymbolSize.Auto.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl
member.summary: BarcodeControl is a Windows Forms control that allows authoring of PDF 417 two-dimensional barcodes. PDF 417 is a format that can encode binary data as well as text and can includes extensive protection from symbol damage.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new DataMatrixBarcodeControl.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the Pdf417BarcodeControl object.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.Columns
member.summary: Returns the number of columns in the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the error correction level in the barcode.
member.remarks: This value determines how many error correction code words will be included in the barcode. The correspondence is exponential. A value of 0 yields 21 code words, 1 yields 22 code words. In general a value of n yields 2n+1 code words.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.InnerBounds
member.summary: Returns the inner bounds of the PDF 417 symbol.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.LayoutMode
member.summary: Determines how the PDF 417 modules are presented. Default is LayoutMode.Auto
member.remarks: If LayoutMode is set to Manual, ModuleWidth and ModuleHeight need to be set by client code.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.ModuleHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets the height of modules within the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.ModuleWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the width of modules within the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.Orientation
member.summary: Sets or gets the orientation of the barcode. Default is Pdf417SymbolOrientation.Horizontal

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.Rows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows in the DataMatrix barcode

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeControl.Truncated
member.summary: Sets or gets whether or not stop patterns and right row indicators will be drawn.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter
member.summary: The DataMatrixBarcodeWriter class allows creation of PDF 417 two-dimensional barcodes on Graphics objects.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the Pdf417BarcodeWriter object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Render
member.summary: Draws the PDF 417 barcode on a Graphics object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Render(System.Byte[],System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws a barcode representing the supplied binary data onto the Graphics object within the bounds.
member.param: Binary data to render in the barcode.
The Graphics object on which to draw.
The bounds of the barcode.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Render(System.String,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws a barcode representing the supplied text onto the Graphics object within the bounds.
member.param: The text of the barcode.
The Graphics object on which to draw.
The bounds of the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Bounds
member.summary: Binary data to render in the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Columns
member.summary: Returns the number of columns in the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the error correction level in the barcode.
member.remarks: This value determines how many error correction code words will be included in the barcode. The correspondence is exponential. A value of 0 yields 21 code words, 1 yields 22 code words. In general a value of n yields 2n+1 code words.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Layout
member.summary: Determines how the PDF 417 modules are presented. Default is LayoutMode.Auto

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.ModuleHeight
member.summary: Sets or gets the height of modules within the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.ModuleWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the width of modules within the barcode.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Orientation
member.summary: Sets or gets the orientation of the barcode. Default is Pdf417SymbolOrientation.Horizontal

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Rows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows in the DataMatrix barcode

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Barcoding.Writing.Pdf417BarcodeWriter.Truncated
member.summary: Sets or gets whether or not stop patterns and right row indicators will be drawn.
